title.rendered: Anker iPhone Charger Cable – Apple MFi Certified 6ft/1.8m Lightning Cable Premium Nylon Apple Charger Fast Charging…

content.rendered:
(*6*)

Read more

One of the Leading Charging Technology

Thanks to pioneering innovation and an insistence on utilizing solely the best-high quality supplies, Anker creates the market benchmark for charging and connectivity.

Premium Double-Braided

Nylon Lightning Cable [6ft/ 1.8m]

Tough building lasts 5 occasions longer than generic cables, mixed with a unibody connector design to forestall detachment.

Get a complete lifetime of charging from one iPhone charging cable.

  • Proven Durability
  • Double-Braided Nylon Exterior
  • Premium Unibody Connectors
  • Apple MFi Certification

Read more

(*7*)

MFi Certified*

Apple’s third-social gathering certification ensures complete compatibility with any Apple system which makes use of a Lightning connector.

*For extra particulars please go to apple web site.

Stronger for Longer

Lasts 5x longer than normal cables, confirmed with face up to the check of time.

Quality Connections

Sturdy unibody connectors resist injury whereas guaranteeing a safe match, each single insertion.

Read more

Read more

Premium Nylon Cable

The Durable Sync-and-Charge Cable

Superior Durability

A tricky nylon exterior resists injury from the skin, whereas the cable’s inside is precision-designed to deal with 1000’s upon 1000’s of bends.

MFi Certified

The seal of approval from Apple themselves. This premium charging cable is formally verified to work flawlessly with your iPhone, iPad, and extra.

High-Speed Performance

Guaranteed to cost your gadgets as quick as an authentic iPhone charger cable. Forget about worrying whether or not or not your charging cable is squandering precious time.

(*11*)
Premium Nylon A-to-Lightning PowerLine II A-to-Lightning Premium Nylon A-to-Lightning PowerLine III A-to-Lightning PowerLine II USB-C to Lightning Cable New Nylon USB-C to Lightning Cable
Length 6ft 6ft 6ft [2-Pack] 6ft 6ft 6ft
Bend Lifespan 12000+ 12000+ 12000+ 25000+ 12000+ 12000+
Material Nylon braided exterior Bulletproof fiber strengthened, TPE exterior Nylon braided exterior Bulletproof fiber strengthened, TPE exterior Bulletproof fiber strengthened, TPE exterior Double-braided nylon exterior
MFi Certified ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

The Anker Advantage: Join the 80 million+ powered by our main know-how.
Enhanced Durability: Improved building methods and supplies make an iPhone charger cable that lasts 5X longer than the norm. Withstands 90-diploma bends over 5,000 occasions, and bears as much as 88 lbs of weight.
Certified Performance: This iPhone charger cable is MFi licensed and geared up with an Apple C48 Lightning plug to make sure complete compatibility and excessive-velocity charging.
Improved Length: With 6 ft/1.8 m of cable, you’re capable of “walk and talk” on the cellphone, chill out in mattress, or cost in any place that’s handy for you.
What You Get: Premium Nylon Lightning iPhone Charger Cable (6 ft/ 1.8 m), welcome information, a lifetime guarantee, and our pleasant customer support.
